title: Jet Car Stunts - TheDarkKnight
description:
Store Page:
 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/274880/

About This Game:

NOW IN HD!!!

Jet Car Stunts is an award winning, over the top, adrenaline rush, 3D driving game, with massive jumps, mid-air hoops, floating platforms, spiral roadways and outlandish manoeuvres in impossible environments. The original levels, tight controls and fast, smooth, addictive game play has landed Jet Car Stunts on many "Best of 2009" lists for iOS and now it is available on Android, Play Station, Xbox and PC! Jet Car Stunts is less like a driving game and more like a platformer. Rather than racing opponents around a track, your opponent is the track its self. Get ready for a challenge, because getting to the end

of these insane tracks will test your skills.

**** Features ****
- Smoothest, fast game play
- Tightest, most responsive driving controls.
- Smash Physics.
- 36 insane tracks. Each track offers something new.
- Multiple play modes.
- Jet assisted drift handling.
- Half car, half jet with in-air control surfaces.
- Online leaderboards and achievements.
- Upload replays with your best times.

**** 3 PLAY MODES ****
- Platforming - The challenge is simple, just get to the end. Each track is more challenging then the last.
- Time Trial - Race to reach the next check point before the time runs out. Beat your best time.
- Tutorials - Learn all the tricks you will need to meet the challenges to come.

With 25 challenging Platforming levels and 11 Time Trial levels, this is some of the best value you can find on the Steam Store.

Authors Note:

Why I do this? I share because I want to give back to the community that has given to me for years. I believe torrents are a great form or advertising and promoting. When people can test games and watch movies before buying them they are more likely to support the developers / producers by buying their products.

I Try to release things no one else has so when people steal my torrents without saying thanks or giving recognition it makes me want to stop. So if you want to share my stuff please ask or mention me.

Please don't hit and run show some appreciation and say thanks/seed so you motivate me to keep sharing things that no one else has. My motivation is to give to the community but if your not telling me you like it I feel i'm wasting my time. I have lots of stuff no one else has shared but i'm not going to put much time into it unless people seed and say thanks. -TheDarkKnight


!!!IF YOU LIKE THIS PLEASE SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS AND BUY IT!!!
